metadata.name: *Shiny* Scary Gary 1/111
metadata.description:
Scary Gary is the first to crawl from the depths of c.weird's "Good meeting." series. A selection escapist day-mares first dripped from ballpoint pen between managerial bullet-pointed items on meeting agenda printouts, they are the artifacts that emerged from my attempt to stay sane during meetings at my pre-COVID day job. 

This special *shiny* edition is the shimmering flagship that precedes my "Good meeting" series, which has since evolved into the "Good meeting-19." 

At the dawn of 2020, I selected 19 of my "Good meeting." doodles in addition to Scary Gary (as he had already emerged from his digital womb) to become a series I completed for an exhibition that never happened, as another "-19" dominated the world's attention just a month after I completed my 19-piece  series... 

And so collectively they are the "Good meeting-19"...soon to be revealed.
